page.title: 08LifeStyles Crosthwaite'area'
page.content: {Three hotels}varying in size and amenities,employ 36 Staff in the summer months,of which only 5 are local.The others, drawn from all parts of the country,'live in'. {The Masons Arms}has an old world atmosphere,without accommodation.It serves Bar Meals and Ale.In winter it accommodates meetings for{The Darts {& Domino Team,The Cartmel Fell {Discussion Group}and{The Coniston {Foxhounds.The Hare and Hounds}also has an old world atmosphere. It has 7 rooms for accommodation and two larger bars. One contains a Pool table, Television,Juke Box,Space Invader Game and a Dart Board to attract the younger customer.In the other 3 course Bar Meals are obtainable.{A Darts Team and{A Pool Team}play in the local winter League. Special functions are sometimes held in both establishments.
